ideas.title: Show don't tell: Embed Make prototypes everywhere you work in Figma
ideas.description: Today, we’re introducing the ability to embed Figma Make prototypes into Figma Design, FigJam, and Figma Slides, along with new editing tools that help you build and share your best ideas.
hooks: Transform Figma Prototypes: Embed Everywhere Instantly
Unlock Seamless Design Flow with Make Embeds
Prototype Smarter: Figma's Game-Changing Embed Feature

tips: Use screen capture with clear cursor movements
Add chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: Bold, dynamic visual style with vibrant Figma blue and white color palette. Clean, geometric motion graphics highlighting prototype transitions. Sharp, modern sans-serif typography with high-contrast callouts. Animated cursor and interaction highlights to demonstrate workflow. Minimalist yet energetic design language that feels cutting-edge and precise.

exampleOutline: Introduction: Why Prototype Embedding Matters

ideas.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
ideas.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.
hooks: Design Templates That Don't Break Your Brand
Figma Secrets: Make Templates That Scale
Master Flexible Brand Design in Figma

tips: Use screen recordings showing actual Figma workflow
Include picture-in-picture of presenter for personal connection
Add chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: Bold, dynamic motion graphics with Figma-inspired color palette. Clean sans-serif typography with animated transitions. High-contrast color blocks representing template flexibility. Dynamic screen recordings with animated overlay graphics demonstrating template mechanics. ideas.title: Introducing three new tools for precise image editing in Figma
ideas.description: Today we’re introducing three new AI image editing tools that make precision editing faster, cleaner, and more intuitive—powering a more complete creative workflow in Figma.
hooks: AI Transforms Figma: 3 Game-Changing Image Tools
Design Precision Redefined: Figma's New AI Magic
How AI Is Revolutionizing Image Editing Forever

ideas.title: Senior Designer, Moniker, San Francisco
ideas.description:
Moniker is looking for a Senior Designer 100% focused on visual identity work: concepting and designing brand systems that can scale across complex organisations, digital products, and real-world environments. This role is hands-on, highly collaborative, and ideal for someone who is as comfortable defining a core visual idea as they are building out the details of a system so it
The post Senior Designer, Moniker, San Francisco appeared first on BP&O - Branding, Packaging and Opinion.
hooks: Inside Moniker's Design Dream Job: What They Want
How to Land a Senior Design Role at Moniker
Design Career Hack: Moniker's Hidden Hiring Secrets
